Game.Name: Pokémon Cloud White 2
Game.Plot: The scenario starts after the last event of Pokémon Cloud White. Be prepare to discover 3 new regions : South Sinnoh, Sinnoh and Hoenn. FEATURES 3 Regions : Sinnoh, South Sinnoh and Sevii 35 h of Scenario All the Pokémons (gen 1 to 7 + some fakes mega evolutions) All the Primal reversion and Mega Evolutions Day & Night system BW Repel System 6th Gen exp.catch system New Battle Backgrounds New Battle Boxes New trainer sprites Dollsteak patch Berry & Honey trees Cuztomizable House etc.
